addonCore.label: BehDEPOT_v045
addonCore.description:
new in 0.45: CHANGE
batch processing of cues: when batch processing and analyzing cues, you can now autoload cues by adding a csv cue file into the folder to be processed. NB: the cue file must have the phrase "cue" in the title (conversely, the tracking file must NOT have "cue" in the title)
cue-based analysis breakdown. In Behavior_Filter, relevant components now breakdown cue-based analysis as vectors for each cue. These are located in
Behavior_Filter.Temporal.[event].[behavior].Cue_BehInEventVector (for behavior vectors during each event),
Behavior_Filter.Intersect.ROIduringCue_Vector.[event[_[ROI] (for vectors of events in which the animal is in the ROI), and
Behavior_Filter.Intersect.SpaTemBeh.[behavior]_[ROI]_[event]_CueVectors (for vectors pf cue times when the animal was both in the ROI and engaging in behavior).
